documents.document:
BOO

sorry that it has been awhile since i have written anything been busy with homework and all that grand junk haha get to go get smack tonight (knock out drugs for teeth) even though the extractions aren't till july 3rd anyways still pretty cool that i only have to get 2 wisdom teeth out instead of 4..haha tg.... yay had to write grad write up for when we walk on stage today that was pretty interesting...tomorrow is the grad group picture and then thursday is practically friday for us cuz there is no school on friday cause of the holiday on monday so that is pretty cool....anyways so that means dressing up fancy...grr stupid pictures am having fun drawing on myself and i still need to set up my laptop because all my music got erased from my ipod because i updated my ipod...grrr 3000 songs just gone yea was not a happy camper at that time and haha Kt Heya Opera Singer...lol anyways sorry took a break and people started drawing on me haha got some pretty cool drawings on me also just with some random shit...lol anyways guess i better work on some actual work before i get in trouble anyways Ciao

wow

so another day in the life of me...its technically at school cuz there is no school tomorrow which is pretty sweet, also there is no school or work on monday but tomorrow i do have to work which means i can sleep until 2 get ready and then go to work tis sweet lol i get to sleep in a lot this weekend and its exactly what the doctor ordered well not literally but u understand what i mean and if u don't then u will understand about the purple flying elephants with the purple flying monkies and yes they are from the wizard of oz anyways enough about that topic....i am going to the lake this weekend at some given point and most likely going swimming because its just that warm... even though it sux not have the luxary i honestly don't miss setting up the inflatable pool thats friggen huge and i don't think my grama really wanted me to kill her grass for the 5th year in a row lol...although there are other ways to kill grass but we're not going to go there and how i know that information...i definantly get a peaceful weekend which is what i have been asking for a very very very long time now and yay! lol finally get it...uh am failing one class but thats because im lazy and bored and don't feel like doing anymore html...yea i know ur like wth that stuff is easy but if u know html u also know how time consuming it is and i don't have a high attention span right now, its about a 1.5 mins so....lol we're just not going to go there with that one unless someone wants to make 2 of them for me... waits for a response... ok fine nvm then lol i've now had my laptop for almost 2 weeks and i love it even though it still keeps me up past my bedtime and even though its a pain in the butt when Toshi does not want to co-operate... Grr *shakes fist and then hugs and pets the computer apologetically* even though she frustrates me i love her to pieces and she runs so amazingly well and i love Vista and the virus program its comes with best virus program i have ever had and vista is pretty much exactly like XP just upgraded and better.... Nermal is still being a pain in the ass and so is Copper more so than ever grr stupid dog, shall know better than to bark at 3am anyways guess i better finish up getting ready for school anyways do me a favour people go for a walk along the beach if u can and make sure u have lots of time to do so and just slowly walk along the water and watch the sea life it is the most relaxing thing ever and it makes u smile anyways ttyl ttfnxoxoxoxoxoxo

wow

hello everyone, so i had a lazy weekend...got the cold going around yay for being sick again and just when i can least afford to be sick cuz finals are coming up soon...tomorrow is the finale of house am so sad but excited cuz i don't want it to end but the season finale's are always so amazing so who knows...i believe i have an ear infection and can only breath though my mouth and can only consume liquids right now cuz it hurts too much to eat solids...and am having really bad fevers and should probably not be at school but as finals come closer each and each day i don't really have a choice now do i...i wonder how i did on my practice exam for geography hopefully good because then that means not as much study is needed as i thought...anyways i miss you all! and will miss you guys more and more because i will be on less and less on the coming days since i will be pretty busy with grad prep and finals and making sure i am grading and help mom finish my dress and make sure everything works for my dress and decided what else is gunna happen and everything like that...lol good thing this only happenes once lol dunno if i could do this a second time lol... there is a huge cocktail party sometime after grad as well as Canada isn't too far and then after Canada day i get drugs that make me see pretty colours and i get two of those pills and then i get numbing gel on my gums and then i get numbing needles into my gums and then i get 2 extractions done which incase u don't know is getting your teeth pulled which is a hell of a lot better done than getting wisdom teeth cut out of the bone...ughhh lol still have to have that happen but not for a while... and then a week and a half later its my birthday! yay! hehe am so excited for that and i am getting completely wasted for that birthday lol anyways i guess i shall go and do some work ttyl ttfn byebye xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo

hi

so i had an interesting weekend....not fun at all looking after drunks...and today is monday, i hate mondays especially when people pretty much ignore you and act like you don't exist thats always grand especially after you do so much and then they do shit like this it just shows how much they appreciate what you did....tomorrow is tuesday that should be better hopefully good thing school is almost over and hopefully i am graduating...no way i could spend another year at this hell hole, so i was suppose to go to a study thing at my teachers house this weekend and i had a ride there and i need a ride back so my mom said she would give me the ride back and my friend said i had a ride there but now she is driving someone else who asked after i did and she said if she has to she guesses she could drive me as well but only if she has too even though i did ask first and was promised but u know i guess that doesn't mean much anymore....i doubt im even going anymore why bother im going to get shoved in some corner and get ditched while everyone else in my group takes over....gees i love people sometimes anyways i have my finals coming up geography is next wednesday and then after that is government exams maybe...and this most likely makes me sound like a bitch but this is what is going on in my life right now and this is how i feel...i don't mean to sound like a bitch but just some things really piss me off...went to the lake on saturday and got a horrible sunburn which will be gone before grad and my mom keeps saying she is going to work on my dress which is only 3 weeks away and she says o well i'll get to it eventually....my dress kinda needs to be completeled before grad... this weekend just really sucked and was totally not worth it at all...i wish i had stayed home and slept all weekend instead of hangingout with drunks and retards...anyways ttyl ttfn

peek a boo hehehehehehe

so today has been a pretty good day tomorrow is thursday and friday is not far behind am madly studying for geography yay lol almost time to take finals and there is not that many days left for school its unbelieveable...mom is making cheescake for saturday on friday for the studyathon chocolate cheesecake mmm and cookies too.... lol im surrounded by grade 4's right now because there is a teaching thing going on....its uh interesting...anyways Danny is watch the best of stewie and Chris got kicked out of class because hes not special lol hahahahaha almost done the web thing for geography which means not many more assignments left... there hasn't been all that much exciting things going on in my life...Missa re injured her self (internal bleeding) um yea nothing really exciting grad is coming up so fast im not ready for it yet... after 2 weeks i am going to be so busy and its just not gunna slow down until the middle of summer when everyone leaves me all by myself for 2 weeks...maybe i will go somewhere too just where? and with who? lol anyone wanna go get lost in the brumada triangle with me for 2 weeks? lol that would be fun am so not looking forward to extractions but i so look forward to the trippy hallucinating drugs lol anyways i guess i better go do some actual work ttyl ttfn

hello

Ello everyone so grad is getting closer and closer each day, and there are only 3 days left of school which is sad but exciting...i cried a couple of times from reading grad write ups and yearbook signatures...its sad because its almost over but happy because its over... no more homework or exams or anything like that, the memories will always be there but i don't want the year to be over, i want them to continue and i want to be able to walk into Steve's room every morning and give him a hug without those morning hugs or hi's its going to be so weird and sad....i can't believe that is over..just yesterday it all started when we started highschool together and stuck together but now its all over and we are all graduating and going our own seperate ways and yes we will get to see each other and visit but its still not going to be the same, i can't just call Kt up to hangout...i have to take a 3hr bus ride to go see her now same goes for Will and some other people...because everyone is leaving in the fall this is going to be the best summer ever and there are going to be so many parties and all that junk...there are a couple bonus's about grading but there are so many negatives...i have no idea what i am doing in the fall most likely work but i dunno i want to go traveling but where to start and i want to go by myself but i don't because it would be lonely more than scary...i believe i might travel for a bit this fall maybe around Italy or Europe who knows...anyways i better get back to studying..bye bye ttyl ttfn

ello

so today was a good day except for a couple of people who pissed me off but anyways today was pretty good i get to go get a corsage soon!!! which is pretty cool and grad is coming up fast its a week this Thursday i am getting my hair colored and cut on Saturday as well as getting my eyebrows waxed cause haha they need it lol and guess what my birthday is coming up soon too real fast its so shocking.... and scarier... i can't believe i graduated i'm so happy and glad that is all over but so sad because i am going to miss everyone!!! i am just missing one thing and hopefully that comes together soon...anyways i guess i shall go and watch tv so ttyl ttfn byebye!!xoxoxoxoxoxo

hey

so another day in the life of Paige got some pretty cools things this Easter i got the DVD Happy Feet and season one of Futurama thats sweet and then i got lots and lots of chocolate oh and movie tickets which is what i wanted because a whole bunch of movies i want to see are coming out like POTC 3 and Shrek 3 and movies like that....am not doing all that much today i have English homework to do but i am too lazy to do the homework...i have to read an 18 page story and then answer 10 questions and theres like 6 questions in each question...so am not doing them until i absolutely have too...tomorrow i have no school but i have to go to work should be a holiday for work as well...there is another long weekend coming up soon that i look forward too...i get an extra long weekend because i am going to the famine and then the holocaust the day after the pro d day and i will be in down island all day for the holocaust so no school or work lol it shall be awesome, i think i might go have a couple naps today i am tired and i have to go to work tomorrow...dunno if i am going to go to work or a full day or not i dunno maybe go to work early and get some extra hours in...extra money and closer to the hours i need for grad...anyways i think i might drop English its becoming stressful and hard and i am lazy...anyways i am going to go watch Futurama and maybe have a nap so ttyl ttfn!Toodlez! xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo

blah

so another day in the life of Paige, so today hasn't been too exciting haven't really done all that much today been playing with msn bots, hangmen and things like that...am suppose to be doing my english homework but they are distracting....anyways tomorrow is wednesday and then its thursday and then friday and then its the weekend...i have the weekend booked, have to get money for the famine and then am watching movies with missa and am maybe going to the school play sometime on friday we're watching POTC and more movies so it shall be fun... am going to bed a little bit early tonight because i am tired....either that or i just need caffine but hey who knows...tomorrow i have nothing planned except homework...hey homework...i really don't want to go to work today...hmm there is not really all that much happening anyways i am going to go so i shall ttyl ttfnToodlez! xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo

muffin men

why hello everyone hope the week has been good to you i know the week was good for me...tomorrow is saturday yay! weekend lol finally get to sleep until 2pm lol yes i actually do sleep in tilll that time tomorrow i have to go deal with a power point presentation at some point and then i have the rest of the weekend do what ever the hell i want to do...lol which means i will be hanging out with my computer unless someone invites me to go somewhere else hmmm anyways guess i better the homework done for the weekend so i have time to do whatever i want anyways toodles and ttyl ttfn

hey

hey
today is yet another day...its tuesday and house is on tonight yay! lol it looks like a good episode! i miss him so very very much and it hasn't even been that long wow i am a sap anyways tomorrow is wednesday which is another day closer to friday i am excited for friday lol

Beautiful Sunshine

She gets up on the wrong side of bed,
the world is turned upside down on her
everything is thrown into darkness.

The next day the same thing happenes
her world is turned upside down on her
she hates how her friends changed

She hates getting up in the morning
because everyday its the wrong side of the bed
her world is still turned upside down

One morning it becomes all different though
she wakes up feeling the same but,
one day that all changes.

The world turns right side up
her life is no longer gloomy
and she finally has something to live for.

This is the day she met him.
This guy that would be different from all the rest,
a guy who is one of a kind.

that just came from no where....lol i got a creative moment and thats what came out of my thoughts! pretty interesting eh? i thought it was something new and exciting anyways am off to go do something rat-a-tat-tat! lol ttyl ttfn byebyexoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo

Dirty old shoe that fits

so today was an alright day i guess...not a day that i wanted but hey better than the rest got a work evaluation today yay especially since i was told i wasn't getting one anyones only had one bad thing so that is pretty good i guess...anyways tomorrow is thursday and i so can not wait for friday, which is going to be friggen amazing! lol am very excited and he knows why....uh nothing going on tomorrow except more homework and less time to do it...hmmmm, what else is going on in my life that u people might be interested in uh uh uh i got plans for saturday...am going to funtasia with my friends to play ddr and just hangout all day do whatever comes to mind will most likely end up doing what i do every saturday which is either doing something illegal or sitting on my ass in front of the tv or the computer haha yay i am voting on doing something illegal like i dunno yet but u watch i will get creative and figure something out hahaha i always do or Missa does anyways one of us thinks of something...this week has been entertaining, something after something has popped up and i don't look forward to whats coming up soon gees i friggen hate those days the 23rd sux and there is another day that sux as well the 14th wasn't that bad of a day but i still really miss him although it hasn't even been a year....anyways lets find a happier topic...uh it was sunni today which was nice and warm and there was actually no wind today which is unusual but saweet but i hope tomorrow is sunni like it says it is suppose to be but then again the weather men and weather women have weather prediction challeneges just i like i have challeneges with google earth, i will one day conquer it though mwhahahaha.... am getting marks in school still won't know until friday or monday if i made the honor roll for a third time *crosses fingers* i can always wish and hope right? anyways guess i better go do some geography homework considering it was due on monday haha not too late yet eh? lol anyways byebye ttyl ttfn Toodlez! xoxoxoxoxo

Ello

so today is another day closer to friday i look forward to tomorrow! it is going to be awesome lol there is not much planned for today go to school then go to work and then talking to this amazing guy who is so sweet...lol tomorrow is going to be amazing...maybe i will write on here what goes on...and maybe i won't, and then i believe we are hanging out on saturday which shall be friggen amazing!!! anyways i still haven't finished my geography booklet grrr dammit it was due monday so almost a week....o well Kt is waiting until the weekend to do hers so it shall be interesting anyways i am off to go work on that stupid geography booklet ttyl ttfn Toodlez! xoxoxoxoxo

Hello

why hello hello...how is everyone this s'morning? my morning is pretty awesome...Chris is leaving me for the summerawwww he's going to an amazing camp for cadets that he has been waiting for so congrats but still we won't be able to hangout this summer which is a total drag....anyways enough about sadness tomorrow is tuesday house is on yay! lol this morning has started out with laughs and fun times...lol apparently me and Chris are getting married!the wedding is next febuary! lol anyways i guess i should be off to class so i will continue this later ...so i am back mwhaha lol geo class was really good...it was fun and i got most of my work done which is really cool...anyways tomorrow is tuesday yay on wednesday i have a meeting and then i have another meeting on thursday and then on friday i have the 30 hour famine and then on tuesday i have the holocaust trip which means i get an extra long weekend because there is a pro d day on monday and i am not going to school on tuesday because i will be in victoria the only thing that sux about going to victoria is that i can not pay my grad fees until i return...which sux but meh its worth it ...anyways friday is going to be awesome...so what is everyone up 2? did everyone have a good weekend...my weekend was pretty good and next weekend is going to be just as good...uh i work on monday even though it is a pro d day which sux but i get a long weekend in may which is awesome because it is victoria daytee hee lol anyways i am suppose to finish my summary for geo but i really don't want to right now because i have been working on it all morning and it is kinda getting to me which isn't really a bad thing but i guess i just need a little break from it...lol there is not much happening today which is cool i wonder how much longer before Chris gets kick out of math 11 because he hasn't been in a while so ...lol he should just transfer into stupid math and then he would finish it in no time and be done with it anyways i guess i really should go do my geo summary so i wil ttyl ttfnToodlez! xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo

Hello

so not that long until i move...am no longer moving to Nz am moving somewhere else now and only my room mate and someone else knows where...the only other people that know are people who are involved with the move...tomorrow is wednesday i have a meeting for holocaust tomorrow and then on thursday i have a meeeting for 30 hr famine...which is on friday and i get a extra long weekend which is sweet...house is on tonight and i hungout with Chris last night...i missed drive to hangout with him turns out it was a good episode o well can catch it later on dvd anyways we went for a nice long walk on the seawalk which was nice and relaxing...i look forward to this weekend am going to go hangout with friends on saturday dunno what we are gunna do i believe we might go play pool at my friends house which will be sweet and then who knows what we might do...sunday i got plans as well...dunno what they are but lol i am very excited for themam kinda scared and nervous though but it shall be fun...life has been kinda interesting lately have had to double my ant-acid intakes and drink more milk than usual but that comes along with stress and things like that...if ur curious about it just ask and maybe i will be inclined to tell you other than that....anyways i wish i was at home right now sleeping...that would be just amazing and then i wouldn't be stressed out or exhausted i would have loads of energy and would be happy anyways i guess i should continue my geography homework before Steve catches up and my assignment is late so i will ttyl ttfnToodlez! xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo

what the?

so today is another day in the life of moi....tomorrow is thurscay yea i said thurscay its an inside joke...anyways got a meeting today at lunch for Holocaust and tomorrow for 30 hour famine am pretty busy with all this kinda stuff anyways am pretty booked for the weekend and on monday i am working grr but tuesday i get to wake up around 4am to get ready to go to Victoria and then get to sleep the whole way there and the whole way back...it shall be awesome anyways i get free pizza today for making the honour roll which is cool..am no longer bringing a guest to grad so that shall be interesting and entertaining...and i believe i am getting drunk in may long weekend and believe i am doing the same for my birthday which shall be friggen amazing!!! lol i no longer have any idea when or where i am moving its kinda up in the air right now am thinking maybe earlier than january but after Christmas...i dunno maybe i will leave just after christmas and then spend new years wherever we end up...lol it shall be grand though i can't wait to get away from this pitiful place they call CR and off this pitiful island...the ironic funny this is i think i am moving to another island but i don't think its as small as VI though so it will be very very different...i look forward to exploring the island if i move where i think we are...anyways i need to go play ddr sometime soon am going through a withdrawl but everyone is busy and so am i so where to find the time? i dunno maybe i should drop something and go play or something or maybe not sleep for a couple days and play get rid of my withdrawl and then just drink energy drinks and play lol probably not a good idea but i don't really care right now........got a test tomorrrow in geo on biomes and resources although i have no motivation or attention to study for this test and ddr is calling me so that doesn't help either....after tomorrow we're not really doing anything in classes so i get to laze around pretty much...maybe i will just lay on Steve's couch all day or something like that...anyways bah! i am bored but i guess i shall go get free pizza byebye ttyl ttfnToodlez! xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo

bah what?

so tomorrow is the 30 hr famine...lol yay...we just had a huge test in geo so tomorrow we get to relax so we're not doing much but watching a movie...tuesday is the holocaust which shall be awesome! even though i have to get up at an un godly hour...lol o well...anyways, i have a date for saturday...we're going for sushi mmmm sushi i haven't have sushi in a long time i miss the komakazi rolls and the spice crab...i have another meeting today at lunch but its for the 30 hr famine...i get to go grad shopping on tuesday...i need to find some gloves so thats what i shall do...apparently dreamweaver doesn't really like me because its not willing to co-opertate...stupid program...anyways on sunday i have no idea what i am doing anymore i think i am suppose to go play ddr but i don't know, either that or i am suppose to go do something else with a friend...i don't know anymore anyways, i really want to go play ddr but i guess i should really save money for where i am moving in januaryish dunno where that is anymore or when really...anyways there is not much really happening in life...i guess i will update you later on what happenes ttyl ttfn Toodlez! xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo

Sweetest guy ever

- Boy:
Yeah I know everyone does!

-Girl:
Really?

- Boy:
Yeah...everyone of my friends that are girls tell me that everyday.

- Girl:
Oh...but am I only your friend?

- Boy:
No...you're my girlfriend...why?

- Girl:
So when I say I love you I really do mean it.

- Boy:
Yeah I know you do mean it...its just that you dont need to tell me that you love me anymore cuz I know you love me since the day we been together and i love you more each and everyday.

- Girl:
......

- Boy:
So wanna go somewhere tonight for our 7th anniversary?

- Girl:
Yeah...where?

- Boy:
I dont know...maybe movie then dinner?

-Girl:
Ok.

- Boy:
Ill pick you up after I get off and get ready ok?

- Girl:
Ok. What time do you get off?

- Boy:
In 2 hours and then I gotta go home and yeah get ready which takes about 15-20 mintues...

-Girl:
hey...I thought you didnt have work today...

- Boy:
One of my co-workers called in sick.

- Girl:
Oh okay! So ill see you around 7:30 then?

- Boy:
Yeah! and babe?

- Girl:
Yeah?

- Boy:
I love you.

- Girl:
I love you too!

- Boy:
Ok my manager is like looking at me so yeah.... i gotta go.

- Girl:
Ok bye.

- Boy:
Bye.

****************************

2 hours later...

The guy drives to his girlfriends house and walks up to the door and rings bell.

- Girl:
Hey! (gives a kiss to her boyfriend)

- Boy:
Wassup...you ready?

- Girl:
Um...wait...let me get my bag and we can go ok?

- Boy:
Ok.

They both watched a movie and ate dinner...once they were done eating they head back to the car but before she got into the car...

- Boy:
Wait! Can I blind fold you?

- Girl:
Why??!

- Boy:
Its a suprise.

- Girl:
What kind of suprise?

- Boy:
A big one.

- Girl:
Okay but only if you promise me that you will hold my hand while we're driving.

- Boy:
I promise.

- Girl:
Ok blind fold me...

So they drove off...........and then they stoped.

- Boy:
Ok we're here!

-Girl:
Where?

- Boy:
Wait let me walk you to the place!

- Girl:
What place?

- Boy:
Somewhere! (and gives a kiss to her on the lips)

- Girl:
Baby!...

The boy walks her to the place.

- Boy:
Ok...let me take the blind fold off.

- Girl:
Where are we?

He takes it off her and she opens her eyes and sees the view of the city and at that same spot...that's where he first asked her to be his girlfriend....

- Girl:
Omg...(tears come down)

- Boy:
Why are you crying?

- Girl:
This is where you first asked me out...

- Boy:
What are you doing the rest of your life? (he asked on his knees and after he says that...behind him...in the air it says "Will you marry me?" in fireworks)

- Girl:
(tears come down faster)

- Boy:
I wasnt at work when you called me...I was planning this whole thing!

- Girl:
Get up!

- Boy:
Yeah?

- Girl:
(kisses him)

- Boy:
Is that a yes or a no?

- Girl:
Yes.

If you don't repost this you will have the loneliest life!

BUT!

If you do repost this, you will have a relationship that will last as long as you want it to!

You have 3 minutes to repost this.

if your a girl repost this as "THE SWEETEST BOY EVER"

And if your a boy post as "WHAT I WOULD DO FOR MY GIRL"

bubbles

hello everyone...another day in the life of me...tomorrow is monday which i don't have any school lol yay crappy thing is i have work and another crappy thing is that i feel like someone took a 4x4 to my body and beat the living daylights out of me of course that didn't really happen but it feels like it did...also i think i am getting that cold that is going around..i dunno i can't really afford to get sick right now so i hope not...anyways i did some gardening today and spent the day looking for my cat because he ran away...hopefully he comes home soon....i would cry for days and days and days if he didn't come home...i am exciting about tuesday even though i have to get up early... but i can sleep all the way there on the bus and all the way back on the bus and then come home and sleep because i have school on wednesday but the amazing thing is, is that the students who aren't going on the holocaust trip have 4 days of school where as people who did go on the holocaust they get 3 days of school mwhahahahahahaha lol theres not that many people going which sux and which means Steve might have to cancel the second bus but i think it shall be interesting on tuesday anyways i am going to go relax and read my book and wait for my muscles to stop being sore and bruised...ttyl ttfn! Toodlez! xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo

ello

so i went to the holocaust yesterday and it was fairly good...the bus ride was really really scary though...our bus driver was driving standard and didn't really know how...me and Chris sat there saying aww the poor bus as he grined the gears and didn't shift properly or use his clutch very well either...it was scary and interesting...went shopping got gloves for grad yay! my grad dress is almost complete...mom still has to hem it but hopefully that happenes soon and tomorrow is thursday apparently i get to pay aftergrad tomorrow...and don't get to pay actual grad ceremony until may 29th stupid ppl why can't we just pay it all at once instead of paying each fee sperately its stupid...anyways i am going to go off to class so i shall ttyl on saturday i get to go find my laptop yay! ttyl ttfn Toodlez! xoxoxoxoxoxoxo

bugga boo

so today is thursday...tomorrow is friday and then its saturday am going to hangout with friend on saturday cuz the fair is in town so we might go to the fair which is cool...it might be my last Canadaian Fair i ever go to...so better make the best of it, lol i am excited about January...it shall be fun...i believe i am getting my laptop sometime next week which is awesome and should be set up and everything right away, i might have to spend my own money which i don't really want to do but i just might to get everything in a laptop...i should be working on my webpage but im too lazy lol would rather write a blog and surf the net while listening to music... i can't wait to get my toshiba and download progams onto it and make it mine but i have to wait for tax return to go instupid tax return taking too long grrr lol....there is nothing really exciting going on in my life right now, uh the only major thing is going to the fair other than that its just school and work...not anything special really....anyways i guess i better start working on the webpage...so ttyl ttfn Toodlez! xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo

laptop
